title: AFC West Breakdown + Training Camp, Watch Your Language! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 7/26
description:
On today’s fantasy football podcast, get a breakdown of possibly the most exciting division in football: the AFC West! Who will be most impacted by Russell Wilson and Davante Adams joining the division? Which receivers will step up for the Chiefs without Tyreek Hill? Would you rather draft Keenan Allen or Mike Williams? Plus, the latest news as training camp is underway! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for July 26th, 2022

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW
